elements.title: James Dickinson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that taxidermist James Dickinson mounted the Armley Hippo (pictured), a hippopotamus native to Yorkshire that is at least 113,000 years old?

elements.title: American Radiator Building (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Raymond Hood designed the American Radiator Building with a black-and-gold facade because he thought that other buildings' windows looked like waffles?

elements.title: Light Years (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Kylie Minogue's seventh studio album, Light Years, was her first number-one album in her native Australia?

elements.title: HSBC Tower (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the HSBC Tower was the largest structure to be constructed in its vicinity since the Empire State Building fifty years earlier?

elements.title: dyadic rationals (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that dyadic rationals, fractions based on powers of two, can be easier to work with than other kinds of fractions for both schoolchildren and computers?

elements.title: USRC Robert McClelland (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that three high-ranking officers of USRC Robert McClelland remained with the ship after it surrendered and entered Confederate service?

elements.title: Ksenia Ovsyannikova (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Russian wheelchair fencer Ksenia Ovsyannikova toured the United States on a "mission for inclusion" in 2017?

elements.title: Scary Stories for Young Foxes (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while writing Scary Stories for Young Foxes, Christian McKay Heidicker, under his agent's advice, "added a snuggle for every snarl"?

elements.title: 追高买进损失惨重 中国电信“阴跌”：会破发吗？ (快科技)
elements.contents:
经过上市首日（20日）暴涨，23日、24日两次一字跌停，市值蒸发千亿之后，中国电信A股进入“阴跌”。
8月25日，中国电信A股平开，开盘价4.95元，随后在5.14-4.77元之间来回震荡。截至

elements.title: 大连一大厦突发大火！黑烟四起 有爆炸声 (快科技)
elements.contents:
8月27日下午，大连市先后两处发生大火，首先是双兴商品城旁边的卖菜商铺，然后是金普新区凯旋国际大楼高层，目前救援工作还在紧张进行中。(腾讯直播入口)

据现场报道，凯旋国际大厦此次火情出

elements.title: 大连地标大厦突发大火！5个小时了还在燃烧 (快科技)
elements.contents:
8月27日下午16时许，辽宁大连的地标建筑凯旋国际大厦发生火灾，形势严峻，至今已经过去5个小时，仍然没有完全扑灭(现场直播)。
凯旋国际大厦是高层塔楼，总建筑面积6.3万平方米，由两栋空中连体

elements.title: 杭州昨晚暴雨突袭：开车如行船、车库被淹 (快科技)
elements.contents: 今年夏天，注定是一个难忘的夏天，抛去全国大批的疫情复发之外，多地都迎来了突破记录的大暴雨，且大多是在内陆地区，是原本在大家印象中不应该会下这么大雨的地区，比如河南郑州、湖北随州等等

elements.title: 茅台价格下跌1天迅速上涨：史上最严控价成笑话！ (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 广东最大的蟑螂竟然是白云机场！官方亲自承认 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 大连大火基本扑灭！无人机、直升机救援 (快科技)
elements.contents:
8月27日下午，大连几乎同时发生两场两处严重火灾，引发社会各界关注，尤其是作为地标建筑的凯旋国际大厦，火情异常严峻，现场烟雾弥漫，大火从起火点一直烧到楼顶。

elements.title: 科学家发现天然增加性欲的方法：感受下这效果 (快科技)
elements.contents:
众所周知，太阳是人类生存的必要条件之一。虽然太阳光虽然晒多了会对皮肤有害，但适当的太阳光不仅能促进血液循环和新陈代谢，还能增强人体对钙和磷的吸收，甚至还能够增强性欲。

elements.title: 奖牌掉皮后、日本国旗升错！东京残奥会又现尴尬一幕 囧 (快科技)
elements.contents:
